title: Narayani Stress Balance - BR 7
cleaned_text: Description Narayani Stress Balance BR 7 Management of Stress of any kind.Can be used with Blood Sugar Balance. Breakdown: Homeo - Aconite, Arnica, Ignatia, Kali Brom, Kali Phos, Nat Mur, Op., Yin Yang, Zinc Met. Bach - Cherry Plum, Clematis, Impatiens, Rock Rose, Star of Bethlehem. Organo - Adren., Thym. 50M. Dosing: 2 pills per dose, 6 times daily, dose depending needs. Contains 250+ in a 2 dram of medicated sucrose pills in a glass vial or 1/2 oz. dropper bottle. Homeopathic and nutritional products have not been evaluated by the FDA and are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
